content: Wouldn’t it just be easier for aliens to sort of pull out their wallets and show us their family vacation photos? Maybe we’re trying to over-abstractify first contact. If they’ve developed interstellar spacecraft, surely they’ve thought through how they will communicate with us. It’s likely this wouldn’t be their first rodeo. Maybe it went terribly on the first world they visited and they worked out the kinks in the postmortem. Now, if we happened to be the first world…well, that could suck for us.
